00014 #ifndef PARAMSNOTICE_H
00015 #define PARAMSNOTICE_H
00016 
00017 #include "SharedBuffer.h"
00018 #include "TileMapParams.h"
00019 
00020 // ----------------------- ParamsNotice -------------------------
00021 
00025 struct ParamsNotice {
00026   
00030    bool operator == ( const ParamsNotice& other ) const {
00031       return m_startLatIdx    == other.m_startLatIdx &&
00032              m_endLatIdx      == other.m_endLatIdx &&
00033              m_startLonIdx    == other.m_startLonIdx &&
00034              m_endLonIdx      == other.m_endLonIdx &&
00035              m_detailLevel    == other.m_detailLevel &&
00036              m_nbrImportances == other.m_nbrImportances &&
00037              m_layerID        == other.m_layerID;
00038    }
00039   
00043    bool inside( const TileMapParams& param ) const { 
00044       return m_detailLevel == (int)param.getDetailLevel() &&
00045              m_layerID == (uint32) param.getLayer() &&
00046              m_startLatIdx <= param.getTileIndexLat() &&
00047              m_endLatIdx >= param.getTileIndexLat() &&
00048              m_startLonIdx <= param.getTileIndexLon() &&
00049              m_endLonIdx >= param.getTileIndexLon(); 
00050       // importance not used.
00051    }
00052 
00056    void load( SharedBuffer& buf ) {
00057       m_layerID = buf.readNextBALong();
00058       m_detailLevel = (int) buf.readNextBALong();
00059       m_nbrImportances = (int) buf.readNextBALong();
00060       m_startLatIdx = (int)  buf.readNextBALong();
00061       m_endLatIdx = (int)  buf.readNextBALong();
00062       m_startLonIdx = (int)  buf.readNextBALong();
00063       m_endLonIdx = (int)  buf.readNextBALong();
00064    }
00065    
00069    void save( SharedBuffer& buf ) const {
00070       buf.writeNextBALong( m_layerID );
00071       buf.writeNextBALong( m_detailLevel );
00072       buf.writeNextBALong( m_nbrImportances );
00073       buf.writeNextBALong( m_startLatIdx );
00074       buf.writeNextBALong( m_endLatIdx );
00075       buf.writeNextBALong( m_startLonIdx );
00076       buf.writeNextBALong( m_endLonIdx );
00077    }
00078 
00079    void dump( ostream& str ) const {
00080       str << "ParamsNotice: m_layerID = " << m_layerID 
00081           << ", m_detailLevel = " << m_detailLevel
00082           << ", m_startLatIdx = " << m_startLatIdx
00083           << ", m_endLatIdx = " << m_endLatIdx
00084           << ", m_startLonIdx = " << m_startLonIdx
00085           << ", m_endLonIdx = " << m_endLonIdx << endl;
00086    }
00087 
00089    int m_startLatIdx;
00090 
00092    int m_endLatIdx;
00093 
00095    int m_startLonIdx;
00096 
00098    int m_endLonIdx;
00099 
00101    int m_detailLevel;
00102 
00104    int m_nbrImportances;
00105 
00107    uint32 m_layerID;
00108   
00109 };
00110 
00112 typedef pair<int,int> layerAndDetail_t;
00113 
00115 struct paramsByLayerAndDetail_t : public map<layerAndDetail_t, ParamsNotice>
00116 {
00118    void update( const TileMapParams& param ) {
00119 
00120       layerAndDetail_t ld( param.getLayer(), 
00121                            param.getDetailLevel() );
00122       
00123       iterator findit = find( ld );
00124       if ( findit == end() ) {
00125          // New layer and detaillevel. Add notice.
00126          ParamsNotice notice;
00127          notice.m_startLatIdx = 
00128             notice.m_endLatIdx = param.getTileIndexLat();
00129          notice.m_startLonIdx = 
00130             notice.m_endLonIdx = param.getTileIndexLon();
00131          notice.m_detailLevel = param.getDetailLevel();
00132          notice.m_layerID = param.getLayer();
00133          // Add the notice.
00134          insert( make_pair( ld, notice ) );
00135       } else {
00136          // Update existing notice.
00137          ParamsNotice& notice = (*findit).second;
00138          if ( notice.m_startLatIdx > param.getTileIndexLat() ) {
00139             notice.m_startLatIdx = param.getTileIndexLat();
00140          }
00141          if ( notice.m_endLatIdx < param.getTileIndexLat() ) {
00142             notice.m_endLatIdx = param.getTileIndexLat();
00143          }
00144          if ( notice.m_startLonIdx > param.getTileIndexLon() ) {
00145             notice.m_startLonIdx = param.getTileIndexLon();
00146          }
00147          if ( notice.m_endLonIdx < param.getTileIndexLon() ) {
00148             notice.m_endLonIdx = param.getTileIndexLon();
00149          }
00150       }
00151    }
00152 };
